channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 disagreements that every married couple should take seriously
item.description: Therapists explain which arguments may signal it's time to seek help.

item.title: White House requests investigation of American woman's killing in West Bank
item.description: The family of Aysenur Ezgi Eygi said an Israeli investigation into her death would not be sufficient and called on the Biden administration to order a...

item.title: The bond market just flashed a reliable recession signal. Don’t panic.
This German startup is Europe’s best hope for developing AI advancement outside Silicon Valley
item.description: Last year Aleph Alpha touted an investment in excess of $500 million from the country’s industrial giants and one of its richest tycoons.

item.title: Coinbase has worst week of the year as crypto stocks plummet
item.description: Concerns about the U.S. economy led to a broad market slide this week, with crypto-related assets seeing some of the steepest drops.

item.title: This benchmark chip-stock index has a big, bearish pattern building in its chart
Sheriff says man killed 81 animals in hours-long shooting rampage: ‘These were people’s pets’
item.description: Dozens of animals, including ducks, chickens, goats and two miniature horses, were slaughtered in a "traumatic" shooting.

item.title: Dell and Palantir to join S&P 500; shares of both jump
item.description: In the quarterly rebalancing of the S&P 500, tech companies Dell and Palantir were added to the benchmark index.

item.title: Palantir, Dell to join S&P 500; American Airlines, Etsy slide out of index
Trump Media stakeholder wins court fight to sell shares
item.description: Friday’s ruling involves UAV’s concerns that it will not receive its Trump Media shares, currently valued at about $350 million.

item.title: Masimo CEO shared confidential information with investor ahead of release, court filing shows
item.description: Court documents unsealed Friday show Masimo CEO Joe Kiani shared material nonpublic information with an investor in March just before it was released.

item.title: Nvidia shed $406 billion in market cap this week. What’s next for the stock?
Palantir and Dell surge as they join S&P 500 in latest index reshuffle
item.description: American Airlines Group Inc., Etsy Inc. and Bio-Rad Laboratories Inc. are being replaced on the index.
